post.body: About time. Oh yeah, be polite. Thanks for the follow.
The joke you told was funnier when I read it correctly.
I just realized you weren't following me so you were missing the jokes. Oh well.
Did you har about my brother? ......He died.....picking avacados.
Why do elephants paint their privates green? ....to hide in avacado trees.
I love popcorn, I think it is my chocolate.
@timelmo Don't worry, I collect twitter spam.
Sue promised me funny
Like standing on your head or prending to eat goldfish?
Okay, I like funny.
Don't quite agree. "The Secret" is like Law of Attraction light. Inspirational, but doesn't stand on its own.
F no 1 answered U have the tiny URL ability when U use TweetDeck. It's a free twitter manager. Pretty cool. Google it.
Thanks, Everyone should start the day with a good laugh. Life's too short not to enjoy the heck out of it.
Slappig mentality is foreign to my world view. Can't think of anyone I know that would take on the role of slapper or slappee
I was going to respond to the hitting thing, but I can't think of any anwer that would have a harmonious outcome.
I really enjoyed our banter. Maybe I could pick the topic. I thoroughly love polish sausage w/ cheese & covered w/ mustard.
Facebook Profile, not yet. Needs doing though I guess.
Can you tell the big guy I really want a new screw gun. My wife thinks getting a battery for the old one is good enough.
A practical mantra: Things always work out for me. Repeat often. Keep us posted.
But we still have that clay shell, so our awareness bounces from our burps to the infinite. We have a lot of tools inbetween.
@MickMonroe Love is a constant like Source itself. We can flow with it, or mess around with other stuff.
The problem is not the fear. Fear is a navigational tool like our senses. It's when we let the fear remind us of past fears...
Are U saying that there is no practical use for fear. You 're a better man than I am if you can live in love 100% of the time.
Might not be the best time, but you've been given a wonderful opportunity to transform Ur life by doing something U really love.
Anyone @DONNAAMOS likes, I have to follow.
OTOH: Without fear, how would we know we are manifesting outside our comfort zone.
give up--I think that was Churchill's speech to the graduating class at Cambridge.
If the opposite of pro is con, then the opposite of progress is Congress--Mark Twain
Great! (Just between you and me, the living room floor is kinda scratched and I've been kinda busy lately.)
I really hope you didn't send a bull elephant.
Still has three more to go. Nows the time folks, step up and follow this leader. Retweet if necessary.
Thanks for the kudos.
is 5 short of her goal for tonight. Who can resist their inner sanctuary.
thanks. I was looking for free eBooks to give to a i-biz class (Did my Master's Thesis on Writer's Apprehension.)
Ah, there you are.
Okay, explain personal peace. I hate to admit ignorance, don't you?
Sorry guys, my wife says I'm on Chick Flick duty. She says I have to learn the right way to apologize. See ya later twitilators.
Don't mind me, until yesterday I thought Busta Move is what you did after consuming too many laxatives.
Sue, you don't mind if I call you 99. You are my 99th follower.
I read "cramping " sex. And I was looking for humor. I thought it was one of those "In 30 years you'll look back things."
Neither The Law of Attraction nor Gravity says or does anything. U R the doer. U bring yourself into alignment or U don't. LOA just is.
(Good Stuff) RT @DONNAAMOS: Want to hear the @wendyYbailey story? Check out interview at www.solopreneurs.org Learn from one of the best.
Well, I need to actually do something today. See ya later Twitterlators.
RT @eft4vets: Preparing 2 work with two new Iraq Veterans. EFT work is SO powerful!--(Vets w/ war issues she wrote the book on it-literally)
If as Source we are all we will ever be, then we just have to imagine the possibilities and become them.
Are you guys absolutely sure my wife wouldn't like a dual turbine floor sander?
RT @WarrenWhitlock: Everyone should follow @michelleprice and tell her she needs to hang out with me more in the new year.. thanks #Happy09
I'm pretty sure "Weihnachten ist Potenz-Zeit! "is German for "Quit sending me your stinking emails!"
Newsletter done w/ 36 minutes to spare. Settling in with a nice California Merlot
RT @scenar: in one word...what made you great in 2008?<---friends
Life is too short not to enjoy the heck out of it.
RT @InnerSanctuary: Life is just too short for complaints... <---Now that's just too close to my motto.
RT @sassyword: wow 6 more followers - do you think I can do it before midnight - Yes I can!
RT @EnergeticEFT: Twappers welcome and follow a masterful EFTer @gillwightman, Retweet often Gill is absolutely great ....
Just got back from the mother of all grocery trips, (car's back after 10 days in shop) and I find I have hit 300. Thanks everyone.
Twappers welcome and follow a masterful EFTer @gillwightman, Retweet often
Just noticed I can make 300 followers by end of year. Woo-hoo.
Still looking for free eBooks on: writing eBooks, social networking, Twitter, Facebook, and starting an I-biz. Recommendations?
Looking for free eBooks on: writing eBooks, social networking, Twitter, Facebook, and starting an I-biz. Recommendations?
RT @eft4vets: Check out Deborah's wonderful e-book with EFT setups on http://bit.ly/ZU1s <---I just started it. It's already great.
